title: S5 Supp Main Looking For Bot or Jungle duo

embed.description: Pazzz / Silver 5 50LP / 34W 54L Win Ratio 39% / Morgana - 9W 7L Win Ratio 56%, Maokai - 5W 6L Win Ratio 45%, Braum - 2W 9L Win Ratio 18%, Brand - 6W 4L Win Ratio 60%, Ezreal - 4W 6L Win Ratio 40%

body:
Hey guys,
I'm a supp main looking for a bot lane or jungler buddy to climb together. 
Currently S5 with overall winrate of 68% but haven't been lucky in ranked so far. 

Mains are Brand{{champion:63}}  (between 68/80% win rate) and Lux {{champion:99}} (around 50/70% win rate), with the occasional Morg{{champion:25}}  and Fiddle {{champion:9}} . I get good KDA's and usually manage to keep my deaths quite low, and can turn into a second mid-laner when I get a little snowball going. 

I'm not a kid (I'm 30) and pretty chill in-game but focused when in ranked. Got good map awareness and know when to roam and ward enemy jungle. 

I'm looking for someone chill, preferably bot lane (although Jungle would be good synergy as well for roams and ganks), no tilt or flame. Be opened to and provide feedback and at least listen to pings :)

Hit me up in-game if you're keen, we can do some draft games before going into ranked.

See ya in the rift!
P.
